title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. V, pt. 220 - Administrative and General Requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. V, pt. 220 - Administrative and General Requirements

State Regulations
§ 220.1 - Type approval
§ 220.2 - Specifications and tolerances
§ 220.3 - Schedules of maximum fees permitted for inspection
§ 220.4 - Schedule of fees for state weights and measures calibration
§ 220.5 - Frequency of inspection and testing of devices
§ 220.6 - Wheel-load weighers and portable axle-load scales; records
§ 220.7 - Farm milk tanks
§ 220.8 - Repealed
§ 220.9 - Repealed
§ 220.10 - Records and reports
§ 220.11 - Retail scales
§ 220.12 - Schedule of fees for type approval examination
§ 220.13 - Administrative review of condemnation, stop-use, stop-removal and removal orders
§ 220.14 - Testing procedures for price verification
§ 220.15 to 220.39 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. V, pt. 220

Statutory authority: Agriculture and Markets Law, §§ 16, 18, 179, 197-b[3][a]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
